# どうやって使うか

## 初期化

```{bash}
gdocker dev init -n -V 0
```

## イメージ作成用ディレクトリの作成

```{bash}
gdocker dev mkdir -V 0 --name bowtie2_a --tags "2.5.1 2.4.4" \
    -r 2.5.1:bowtie2-2.5.1-linux-aarch64.zip:'curl --output $@ -L https://github.com/BenLangmead/bowtie2/releases/download/v2.5.1/bowtie2-2.5.1-linux-aarch64.zip' \
    -r 2.4.4:bowtie2-2.4.4-linux-aarch64.zip:'curl --output $@ -L https://github.com/BenLangmead/bowtie2/releases/download/v2.4.4/bowtie2-2.4.4-linux-aarch64.zip'
```

```{bash}
gdocker dev mkdir ${OPT_VERVOSE} ${OPT_DIR} --arch x86_64 --name bamscale_x --tags 0.0.5 -r stdin << 'EOF'
0.0.5
libBigWig
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/dpryan79/libBigWig.git $(@D)
0.0.5
0.0.5
BAMscale
mkdir -p $(dir $(@D))/BAMscale
cd $(dir $(@D))/BAMscale
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/ncbi/BAMscale.git
git fetch --depth 1 origin dfde02929707d4fc3415ffb5224a0a053c779588
git checkout FETCH_HEAD
0.0.5
EOF
```
